revised_title: Agricultural Water Efficiency and Its Impact on Crop Production
tldr: This article examines the relationship between crop yields and water loss in agriculture. It highlights the importance of water supply and discusses current methods for assessing the response of crop production to relative water loss. The article also explores the opportunities to improve water efficiency in agriculture and the potential impact of climatic change on water supply and efficiency in irrigated and dryland food production.
